Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera
Reviews.Author: Mike Vergon
Reviews.Content: Great little camera overall.  Excellent pictures with many options.  One of the best features is the 1 cm macro setting, and the only slightly negative that I've noticed is that battery power diminishes quicker in the colder weather.  I highly recommend this product to anyone that is looking for a durable, take-anywhere, use anywhere camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Ari2r
Reviews.Content: I just love this camera, excellent features for all I want to do, from water to desert is a very versatile camera. I love the video function in high definition
